Feature Notes:
Bard College: 1 selection
Bonus Proficiencies (College Of Swords): Armor Proficiency (Medium)/Weapon Proficiency (Scimitar)
Font Of Inspiration: Bardic Inspiration refreshes after a short rest
Bardic Inspiration: R60' Can use a bonus action to give an ally a +1d12 bonus on an ability, attack, or saving throw within 10 min 2 times per short rest
Healer: Using a healer's kit to stabilize also restores 1 hit point/Can use a healer's kit to restore 1d6+4 + target HD hit points once per creature per short rest
Observant: Can read lips
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Celtic-Briantia and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: Insight; Medicine; Nature; Perception; Religion

Combat
Hit Points: 54 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium Weapon Proficiency: Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Scimitar; Shortsword; Simple Weapons
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Mace (+8 1d6+2); Quarterstaff (+8 1d8+2); Sling (+8 1d4+2 R30/120); Unarmed (+8 1+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: -20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Blade Flourish: May gain +10' Speed and use a flourish during an attack 1/rd
Charger: Can use a bonus action after a 10' Dash to attack (+5 damage) or to push 10'
Defensive Flourish: May spend 1 Bardic Inspiration to inflict +1d12 damage and gain +1d12 AC for 1 rd
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed melee weapon
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Adds ability modifier to second attack damage
Master's Flourish: May use 1d6 instead of Bardic Inspiration die for flourish
Mobile Flourish: May spend 1 Bardic Inspiration to inflict +1d12 damage and 5' + 1d12' push
Psychic Blades (College Of Whispers): May spend 1 Bardic Inspiration to inflict +8d6 HP psychic damage 1/rd
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Slashing Flourish: May spend 1 Bardic Inspiration to inflict +1d12 HP weapon damage on target and an adjacent foe
Superior Inspiration: Has a minimum of 1 use of Bardic Inspiration available after initiative
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Dexterity
Save: Charisma: 8; Constitution: -1; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 3; Strength: 2; Wisdom: 1
Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 4; B1: 4; B2: 3; B3: 3; B4: 3; B5: 3; B6: 2; B7: 2; B8: 1; B9: 1; S0: 2; S1: 1 Attack: B: 8; S: 8 Spell DC: B: 16; S: 16
Spells:
Acid Splash (S0 Conj): R60' Inflicts 4d6 HP acid (save Dexterity negates) on a single target or 2 adjacent targets
Cloud Of Daggers (B2 Conj): R60' 5' cube inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP]
Command (B1 [Mantle Of Majesty] Ench): R60' Target obeys a one-word command from self (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Dancing Lights (B0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Detect Magic (B1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Detect Thoughts (B2 Divi): R30' Reveals targets' surface thoughts and allows probing deeper (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Dominate Monster (B8 Ench): R60' Target creature obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level extends the duration to 8 hr]
Foresight (B9 Divi): Touched gains immunity to surprise and advantage on attack, ability, and saving throws, and foes suffer disadvantage on attacks, for 8 hr
Freedom Of Movement (B4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Friends (B0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Geas (B5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Glyph Of Warding (B3 Abju): 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder (save Dexterity half), or a spell of up to level 3, when triggered [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP or increases the level of the triggered spell by 1]
Hallucinatory Terrain (B4 Illu): R300' Creates a 150' cube terrain illusion (Investigation detects) for 1 day
Light (B0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Locate Creature (B4 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Mass Cure Wounds (B5 Evoc): R60' 6 targets in a 30' radius regain 3d8+2 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Mass Suggestion (B6 Ench): R60' 12 targets follow a reasonable suggestion (save Wisdom negates) for 1 day [+Level extends the duration to 10, 30, or 366 days at level 7, 8, or 9]
Otto's Irresistible Dance (B6 Ench): R30' Target suffers disadvantage on Dexterity and attacks, and foes gain advantage on attacks, (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Regenerate (B7 Tran): Touched regains 4d8+15 HP, plus 1 HP per rd for 1 hr, and reattaches or regrows severed parts after 2 min
Silent Image (B1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube movable illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min
Silent Image (S1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube movable illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min
Speak With Animals (B1 Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Speak With Dead (B3 Necr): R10' Self can ask a corpse 5 questions; the corpse is then immune for 10 days
Speak With Plants (B3 Tran): Self can talk with and command plants for 10 min
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (B1 Ench): R30' Inflicts ROFL (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Teleport (B7 Conj): R10' Teleports an unattended object or self and 8 allies any distance; greater familiarity with the destination improves accuracy
Teleportation Circle (B5 Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides a link to similar circles for 1 rd
Vicious Mockery (B0 Ench): R60' Inflicts 4d4 HP psychic and disadvantage on the next attack (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd
Zone Of Truth (B2 Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (save Charisma negates) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips and can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Bonus Proficiencies (College Of Swords): May use a proficient melee weapon as a bard spell focus
Countercharm: R30' Performance gives friendly listeners advantage on saves vs. charm and fright for 1 rd
Enthralling Performance: R60' May use 1 min performance to charm 2 listeners (DC 16 Will neg) for 1 hr (damage ends) 1/short rest
Magical Secrets: Can learn 6 additional spells from any class
Mantle Of Inspiration: R60' May spend a Bardic Inspiration use and use a bonus action to give 2 targets 14 temporary HP and an immediate move w/out OA
Mantle Of Majesty: May use a bonus action to cast Command 1/rd for conc up to 1 min 1/long rest
Mantle Of Whispers: R30' May capture a dying person's shadow to use as a disguise (Insight vs. +5 Deception to see through) for 1 hr 1/short rest
Shadow Lore: R30' Target obeys self commands (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 8 hr 1/long rest
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d12 hit points from spending Hit Dice after a short rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the bard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Unbreakable Majesty: May use a bonus action to prevent foes from attacking self for 1 min (DC 16 Charisma neg and inflicts Disadv on saves vs. self spells for 1 rd)
Words Of Terror: 1 min conversation frightens target (DC 16 Wisdom neg; damage ends) for 1 hr 1/short rest
